title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Research on Offline/Print Material Utilization Effectiveness of Online Learning Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can compare advantages/disadvantages of online and offline materials to develop context-appropriate learning strategies
Explain the impact of offline material usage on learning motivation and concentration through discussion data analysis
Design implementation plans for printed materials in diverse learning environments and apply them to actual learning scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
